headline: Jim Cramer Highlights Halliburton as a Speculative Venezuela Rebuild Play
summary: Halliburton Company (NYSE:HAL) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer offered insights on. Cramer highlighted the company’s potential while noting the risks when it comes to owning the stock. He commented: “Everything’s going to have to be rebuilt, maybe Halliburton… Schlumberger, now SLB. All got major contracts in Iraq for a similar situation. It could […]

headline: Is Halliburton (HAL) Priced Attractive After Mixed Returns And Strong DCF-Earnings Signals?
summary: If you are wondering whether Halliburton's share price still reflects fair value, starting with what the current market is pricing in can help you frame your next move. Halliburton's stock closed at US$30.38, with returns of 7.5% over the last week, 8.2% over the last month, 2.6% year to date, 15.7% over the last year, a 20.7% decline over three years, and 54.1% over five years. Taken together, this gives you a mixed picture of recent and longer term sentiment. Recent attention on oilfield...

headline: Halliburton: Keeping An Eye On Venezuela, But Maintaining Our Previous Rating - Hold
summary: Halliburton Company is a Hold: international growth beats, but North America weakness and macro headwinds signal Q4 softness. Click for this HAL update.
